ygData.subject: Re: Charm and Bellow being nerfed on Test Server?
ygData.msgSnippet: On test?  I ve been wondering the same thing myself on Veeshan - bellow doesn t seem to have the range it did. ... with the subject submissions.
ygData.messageBody:
On test? I've been wondering the same thing myself on Veeshan - bellow
doesn't seem to have the range it did.



At 08:28 AM 12/10/99 -0800, you wrote:
>From: Eric Boller <eboller@...>
>
>Don't know if this is true or not. However, a bard
>that plays on the test server claims they have
>introduced some nerfs--err enhancements to charm and
>bellow.
>
>Apparently bellow's distance has been reduced to 2/3
>of the normal distance. Charm distance has been
>reduced to the NEW bellow distance.
>
>Can anyone confirm this? This would really blow.
>
>Thex Luteslinger
>__________________________________________________
>Do You Yahoo!?
>Thousands of Stores. Millions of Products. All in one place.
>Yahoo! Shopping: http://shopping.yahoo.com
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
